title: rename folder does not work on beta4 (version":"5.0.0","versionstring":"5.0")
body:
### expected behaviour
by renaming a folder it should be renamed

### actual behaviour
the new name is not stored

### steps to reproduce
1. access to beta4
2. create a folder
3. rename this folder
4. refresh the web browser

### server configuration
beta4.owncloud.com

### client configuration
browser: ff

operating system: mac 10.7.5

### logs


#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
warning	 search_lucene	 failed to extract meta information for /admin/files/2casa: could not open "/srv/www/beta4/owncloud/data/admin/files/2casa" (does not exist, or is not a file)	 april 2, 2013 15:30

debug	core	include path for class "oca_firstrunwizard\config" starts with "apps/"	april 2, 2013 15:30
debug	core	adding user backend instance of oc_user_database.	april 2, 2013 15:30
warning	search_lucene	failed to extract meta information for /admin/files/2casa: could not open "/srv/www/beta4/owncloud/data/admin/files/2casa" (does not exist, or is not a file)	april 2, 2013 15:30
debug	core	adding user backend instance of oc_user_database.	april 2, 2013 15:30
warning	search_lucene	failed to extract meta information for /admin/files/2casa: could not open "/srv/www/beta4/owncloud/data/admin/files/2casa" (does not exist, or is not a file)	april 2, 2013 15:30
```
